features.importMultipleSources: Import reviews from multiple sources for a product

faq.freePlanQuestion: What's included in the free plan?
faq.freePlanAnswer: Our free plan includes essential features like displaying reviews, adding review photos, and basic customization options—ideal for smaller stores getting started with reviews.
faq.switchPlansQuestion: Can I switch plans at any time?
faq.switchPlansAnswer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan whenever you need. Changes will take effect immediately, and you'll only be charged for the time you use each plan.
faq.trialPeriodQuestion: Is there a trial period for premium plans?
faq.trialPeriodAnswer: Yes, we offer a trial period for you to explore our premium features. You can test the features and see how they impact your store before committing.
faq.billingAnswer: Billing is monthly or annually, depending on your preference. Annual billing provides a discount compared to month-to-month billing.
faq.cancelAnswer: Absolutely! You can cancel anytime directly in your account settings. Once canceled, you'll retain access to your plan features until the end of your billing cycle.
faq.additionalFeesAnswer: Nope! All fees are included in the subscription cost. There are no hidden charges or additional transaction fees.
faq.helpDecidingQuestion: What if I need help deciding which plan is best for me?
faq.helpDecidingAnswer: If you're unsure, our team is here to help! Just reach out to us via chat or email, and we'll guide you to the best option for your store's needs.
